text: New Lancaster is an unincorporated community in Madison Township, Tipton County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. It is part of the Kokomo, Indiana, Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==History== A post office was established at New Lancaster in 1847, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1903. ==Geography== New Lancaster is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Tipton County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana Category:Kokomo, Indiana metropolitan area
title: New Lancaster, Indiana
